body_html:
@bhack Regarding the existence of multiple metrics modules - we are working towards integrating them. After that you will be able to use any metric with any API.

@tanzhenyu Stateful metrics are not supported in eager mode - this means irrespective of whether we convert keras model to estimator or not, this scenario is not supported today. This will be fixed as well when we integrate the metric modules. Having said that, this should not affect (and is independent) adding support for model_to_estimator in eager mode => should not cause a problem in conversion.

body:
@bhack Regarding the existence of multiple metrics modules - we are working towards integrating them. After that you will be able to use any metric with any API.

@tanzhenyu Stateful metrics are not supported in eager mode - this means irrespective of whether we convert keras model to estimator or not, this scenario is not supported today. This will be fixed as well when we integrate the metric modules. Having said that, this should not affect (and is independent) adding support for model_to_estimator in eager mode => should not cause a problem in conversion.
